recipe.name: Pork Chops Patrice
recipe.notes: A recipe from my Uncle Patrick's "bachelor days", which were long and varied.  Somewhere exists a recipe for  Tuna  Surprise which contained lots of strange things such as peas (not to mention "hot tuna") but was generally  pretty tasty.  Sadly I wouldn't rediscover this recipe until well -after- college.  Makes a tasty winter meal.
recipe.preparation: Brown pork chops, add wine and simmer for a while.  In a large Pyrex baking dish, spread soup evenly and add rest of ingredients.  Place chops on top of sauce and bake at 350F for 15 minutes.  When sauce has thinned a little and is bubbly, spoon over chops and continue to bake another 10 minutes.
